Hey,

The Timer Extension allows you to set custom timers and track countdowns right from your browser. Set a specific time duration and receive visual and auditory alerts when the timer is complete. 

* Stay organized,
* Enhance Productivity and
* Never miss an important deadline again with the Timer Extension.
